questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a rural field
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A horse in a natural habitat
B) A sports event
C) A busy street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A building
C) A horse and greenery around it
D) A vehicle

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A horse
C) A person
D) A grassland and some flowers on that

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) Trees
C) Mountains
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A horse
B) A car
C) A person
D) A bench

What is the color of the horse in the photo?
A) Black
B) White
C) Brown
D) Grey

What kind of plants are visible in the photo?
A) Cacti
B) Aquatic plants
C) Trees
D) Grass and wildflowers

What is the horse wearing?
A) A saddle and bridle
B) A blanket
C) A harness/ English bridle
D) No equipment

What is the condition of the grass in the photo?
A) Dry and brown
B) Sparse and patchy
C) Lush and green
D) Covered in snow

What color are the wildflowers in the photo?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Blue/Purple
D) Pink

What is the horse doing in the photo?
A) Running
B) Grazing
C) Standing still/ Walking
D) Lying down

What is the relationship between the horse and the environment?
A) The horse is out of place
B) The horse blends well with the environment
C) The horse is in a confined space
D) The horse is interacting with other animals

What is the horse's head position in the photo?
A) Looking down
B) Looking straight ahead/ Down
C) Looking to the side
D) Looking up

What is the predominant color in the background of the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) White

How much of the horse is visible in the photo?
A) Only the head
B) Head and part of the body
C) Entire body
D) Head and legs

What is the texture of the ground in the photo?
A) Rocky
B) Sandy
C) Grassy
D) Muddy

What is the horse's coat pattern?
A) Solid color
B) Spotted
C) Striped
D) Patchy

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye level
C) Low angle
D) High angle

What is the primary color of the horse's bridle?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) Brown

What type of landscape is in the background?
A) Forest
B) Desert
C) Mountain
D) Urban

What is the horse's orientation in the photo?
A) Facing the camera
B) Facing away from the camera
C) Facing to the right
D) Facing to the left

How many horses are in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the horse's mane color?
A) White
B) Black
C) Brown
D) Grey

What is the horse's leg color pattern?
A) Solid color
B) White socks
C) Striped
D) Spotted

What is the main action in the photo?
A) The horse running
B) The horse standing
C) The horse eating
D) The horse lying down

What is the horse's ear position?
A) Forward
B) Backward
C) Sideways
D) Drooping

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Centered
D) Balanced

What type of bridle is the horse wearing?
A) Western bridle
B) English bridle
C) Halter
D) None

What is the primary color of the foliage in the background?
A) Green
B) Yellow
C) Brown
D) Red

What is the horse's facial marking?
A) Blaze
B) Star
C) Snip
D) Bald

What kind of terrain is the horse standing on?
A) Rocky
B) Grassland
C) Sandy
D) Muddy

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The horse is standing in a grassy field with flowers, with a forest in the background.
B) The horse is walking on a beach with the ocean in the background.
C) The horse is inside a stable with hay in the background.
D) The horse is in a city park with buildings in the background.

What type of vegetation is present in the field?
A) Cacti
B) Trees and shrubs
C) Grass and flowers
D) Desert plants
